title: Ham and Potato Soup
directions: Combine the potatoes, celery, onion, ham, and water in a stockpot. Bring to a boil, then cook over medium heat until potatoes are tender, about 10-15 minutes. Stir in the chicken bouillon, salt, and pepper.

In a separate saucepan, melt butter over medium-low heat. Wisk in flour with a fork, and cook, stirring constantly until think, about 1 minute. Slowly stir in milk as not to allow lumps to form until all of the milk has been added. Continue stirring over medium-low heat until think, 4-5 minutes.
Stir the milk mixture into the stockpot, and cook soup until heated through. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon ground white or black pepper, or to taste
